newsitem.title: ECUADOR: Ecuador's August oil output grew 0.5 pct in year.
newsitem.headline: Ecuador's August oil output grew 0.5 pct in year.

text.p: Ecuador produced an average of 377,886 barrels per day (bpd) of crude oil in August, up 0.5 percent from the same month last year, an official said Wednesday.
An official from the National Petroleum Directorate, who asked not to be identified, said that in August 1995 the country produced an average of 375,983 bpd.
Ecuador's average production in the first eight months was 384,128 bpd, he added, without giving a comparative figure for 1995.
Average oil production last year was 386,706 bpd.
